name: Maiden's Mending
summary: You can tap into some of the magic that flows through your blood to give you new life.
description:
You can tap into some of the magic that flows through your blood to give you new life. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.Traits

Changeling: A creature with this trait has the changeling versatile heritage. Changelings are the children of hags and members of other humanoid ancestries. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by changelings.
trigger: You cast a non-cantrip occult spell or an innate spell from a changeling ancestry feat.
